component.name: wormhole-gui
component.summary: Cross-platform graphical user interface for easy encrypted sharing of files, folders, and text between devices.

description.p: Wormhole-gui is a cross-platform graphical interface for magic-wormhole, providing easy and secure end-to-end encrypted sharing of files, folders and text between computers on a local network. It uses the Go implementation of magic-wormhole, called [wormhole-william](https://github.com/psanford/wormhole-william), and compiles into a single binary.
